CHAT.comment: MOT and Chi work well together. Chi does most of the actual playing , but uses suggestions from the Mot. There is little to no science talk. Magnets are on a table; Mot and Chi are seated at nearby corners of the table; there are some objects stuck to the black base and some in a pile beside it

u.a: says that she will only tape hands; explains magnets activity and that the activity will go for ten minutes
talks about moving something
picks up yellow wand and sticks it to black base
begins to pull objects off black base
pulls objects off yellow wand
drops a magnet ball onto the black base
picks up a silver stick and attempts to stand it up on the black base
leans silver stick against a silver magnet ball on the black base
drops magnet balls onto the black base
whispered
puts a silver man on black base; then takes him off
hands silver man to Chi
tries repeatedly to stand silver man up on the black base but is unsuccessful
places silver man on his head on a plastic magnet ball
picks up another silver man from table and holds it out to Chi
picks up a silver man from the table and puts him on his head on a magnet ball
attempts to stack a silver man on top of another , but the silver man falls over
points to two silver men that she has stuck together on the black base
again indicates the silver men
whispered
holds a nut and silver ball which are stuck together over a plastic magnet ball on the platform; the plastic magnet ball moves
attempts unsuccessfully to stick a dime to the black base
attempts unsuccessfully to stick a penny to the black base
picks up the yellow wand which has the silver circle stuck to it and waves it over the black base
takes yellow wand away from Mot; places it on table and sticks a silver stick to the silver circle
places a washer on the silver circle
Chi is constructing a face on the silver circle with two washers for eyes , a nut for a nose , and a silver stick for a mouth
removes silver stick from silver circle
takes the paper clips and puts them on the silver circle
the paper clips keep sliding off the edge of the silver circle
reaches over and tries to adjust paper clip so that it stays; it doesn't work
the paper clips stay in place
reaches to pick up yellow wand; the paper clips slide out of place
reaches to replace paper clips
sing song
Chi has successfully gotten the paper clips in place again
picks up a silver man and holds it out for Chi
takes silver men from Mot and puts them around the top of the silver circle
picks up yellow wand with silver circle and face construction on it .
moves yellow wand over black base and it sticks; several objects fall off
clears off yellow wand and black base
places silver circle on black base
one of the magnet balls rolls across the table and onto the floor
gets up from table to retrieve ball; it falls off the table again
leans over and gets ball from floor
puts yellow and white checked triangle magnet on the black base
places various objects on the black base; then takes them all off
whispered
whispered
places two silver men on top of one another on the black base
puts another silver man on top of the stack; all the silver men stick together and Chi uses the top one to lift the others off the black base
begins to pull silver men back down toward base; one of them falls
holds another silver man over the one on the black base
stacks a third silver man on top of the first two on the black base
puts a fourth silver man on the stack of men on the black base
attempts to place a fifth silver man on top of the construction; the stack of silver men falls over
begins to places silver men on black base next to one another; then begins to stack them on top of one another again
whispered
picks up silver stick and taps the silver circle on the edge
places silver stick on edge of silver circle
moves horseshoe magnet around construction on the black base; some objects fall
tries to put a washer on top of a magnet ball on the black base but it slides off
heavy sigh
stacks two washers on top of one another on the black base
the washers are not lining up exactly on the base
talks about the time and ending the activity
